event.title: made her first court appearance Thursday morning

data.event: A young woman accused of driving the vehicle that killed Terry A. Corbin in a hit-and-run accident made her first court appearance Thursday morning.

event.title: advised Evans that a penitentiary sentence of between four and 15 years

data.event: Lewis advised Evans that a penitentiary sentence of between four and 15 years is possible upon conviction.

Corbin died Dec. 6, 2008, at Carle Foundation Hospital in Urbana, approximately nine-hours after Paris emergency personnel found him lying in the southbound lane of state Route 1 at the Marshall Street cutoff.
